title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7304.2 - Certification required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7304.2 - Certification required

State Regulations

No facility, subject to regulation, inspection and
evaluation by the Commission, shall be operated unless it shall possess valid
ope rating certificates issued by the Office of Children and Family Services
(OC FS), and the Commission pursuant to this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7304.2

Adopted

New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
